function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of heterogeneity in meta-analyses results","Impact":"Decreased confidence in the reliability of the findings","Mitigation":"Conduct subgroup analyses to explore sources of heterogeneity","Technologies":"Data analysis software for subgroup analyses","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Exposure to greenspace may lead to health benefits","Impact":"Positive impact on public health","Mitigation":"Promote access to greenspace in urban environments","Technologies":"Urban planning and design, public health interventions","People":"Urban residents, public health officials","Owner":"City planning authorities, public health organizations"}]}
